website_summaries.verdict: This bargain-priced men’s dress shirt doesn’t skimp on style or quality, making it an impressive choice for any man looking to dress up.
pros: Feels lightweight, making this a particularly appropriate shirt for the warmer months or layers
Quality material, feels smooth, and doesn’t wrinkle easily
Fits most men well, especially those with an athletic build
Shirt washes well and retains quality over time
cons: Some find the white variation of this shirt to be too thin and even see through

customer_reviews.title: Received a USED shirt
customer_reviews.text: I received a used shirt. The collar is sweat stained, and dirty, the cuffs are dirty. The shirt is wrinkled and poorly folded. There was no internal packaging (pins, plastic collar packaging).
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Patrick Eames

customer_reviews.title: not fitted and the white is very thin and seeing through
customer_reviews.text: This is not a fitted shirt, but a regular-fit one. It fits perfect around the neck, but its cut is straight, with same size in the shoulders as around the waist. So not fitted! At least not for someone with broad shoulders and a lean, athletic body. The white shirt is pretty thin and seeing through, so not a spectacular quality all over. The quality and the misleading fit do not match the $25.99 value. Buy it only for emergencies... like I had too.
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Well this is weird.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this exact shirt in the same size in white (Van Heusen Men's Fitted Poplin Dress Shirt, White, 16 34-35) and it fit me nicely. So I then purchased the same shirt in black (Van Heusen Men's Fitted Poplin Dress Shirt, Black, 16 34-35) and the sleeves were a full inch shorter and doesn't fit. Seems odd that the same shirt ordered in the same size from the same company would turn out to be differently sized. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not fitted.
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is decent quality, and in terms of measurements, it does fit me--but in terms of the cut of the shirt, it's certainly not fitted. I'm not exactly the slimmest guy in the world, but even on me, the midsection billows out. And oddly, the arms are pretty puffy too. It's not a terrible shirt for the money, but if you want a real slim fit, be prepared to visit your tailor.
customer_reviews.author: WheezingLamb

customer_reviews.title: The shirt fit great, the material is comfortably but the fabric tore ...
customer_reviews.text: The shirt fit great, the material is comfortably but the fabric tore by one of the button holes 9 months into owning it. I've never had a problem like that with a Van Heusen shirt so I figure I just got a bad one. Otherwise it looks good, fits well, color holds well against machine washing. Great for a work shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 3 new shirts, and one of them ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 new shirts, and one of them was definitely used. It was unfolded and put into a different bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely not fitted. Though neck is fitting perfectly, all other parts are just too big
customer_reviews.author: rons4612

customer_reviews.title: good value wrinkle free shirt
customer_reviews.text: bought the black one for a formal event. Looks good, good value, 'ok' materials, slim/modern fit, but still felt 'loose' around the waist. like: wrinkle free, modern fit
customer_reviews.author: pacifico

customer_reviews.title: Good shirts, but may be from the reject pile
customer_reviews.text: The color and fit are fine, but one of the shirts I ordered has a small "V" shaped hole in the back from where something sharp took a bite out of it. Perhaps these are priced low because they are the factory rejects.
customer_reviews.author: Borborygmus

customer_reviews.title: the color was very dull thiers a difference between Rich black and dull black ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black 15.5 fitted, fit was ok, the color was very dull thiers a difference between Rich black and dull black Wich I can't stand, the material was thin and baggy with no crisp returned it
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Was sent wrong item...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a fitted dress shirt for a job interview, I was sent a regular fit. Very disappointed after I opened the bag, now I have to wear one of my old dress shirts(sigh).
customer_reviews.author: Carl G

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shirt at a great value! I love the fitted look and so does my wife. I have bought three so far. I just wish there were more colors available.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zook

customer_reviews.title: Only the shoulders/sleeves fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder and sleeve measurements that were specified were correct, but the rest of the shirt was baggy and looked terrible. For a "fitted" shirt it seems to have been fitted for overweight individuals. The armpits were hilariously bad, with the sleeve taking up a huge empty section of the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Vreeland

customer_reviews.title: Got the 15 1/2 size and this shirt could fit two of me
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10, 173 lbs, and have a muscular/cut body type. I'm not sure if the shirt I received was an anomaly, but the 15 1/2 appeared to be tailored towards the obese consumer. Based on the style of the shirt (creases on the arms, the curve cut on the bottom of the shirt, bagginess, etc.) this shirt could be a relic of the 1980s or early 1990s. So if you are not like the majority of American's from the South, then this shirt will not complement your style nor fit you.
customer_reviews.author: Omid Farokh

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised.  Easy to Iron.
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. This shirt hugs your body as it is a fitted shirt, after all. Compared to the Arrow Men's Stretch Fitted Spread Collar Shirt, which is a good comp, this item has less fabric and is easier to maintain. By that, I mean that is easier to iron and it's not just because there is less fabric to iron. Believe me, that is very much appreciated for someone who hates having to iron.
customer_reviews.author: brycekorland

customer_reviews.title: See through and lots of loose threads
customer_reviews.text: Fits ok but the 60/40 cloth is too thin I have other 60/40 shirts that are much more substantial. Also threads sticking out of the cuffs. Cut one a new one appears, it looks ok under a coat,
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as most Van Heusen shirts.
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of Van Heusen shirts. I got this on because it was on super sale. I can see why. It is stiff like it was starched and the sleeves rub my wrists to the point of pain. I am hoping it wears in after a few more washes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent, yet consistent
customer_reviews.text: These shirts do not maintain a consistent sizing from shirt to shirt. They are also inconsistent when it comes to being wrinkle-free. The one consistent fact about Van Heusen shirts is that no matter how gently you wash them and no matter what detergent you use they will fade underneath the front pocket.
customer_reviews.author: damnisthistaken

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, excellent fit
customer_reviews.text: I rarely buy several shirts all the same, with this one I bought1 white then 2 Yellows now I have just purchased 2 white and 1 blue my size is 18,37. I guess that says how satisfied I am with quality and the fit, for what I think is a Just price, though may be slightly on the upper Fair limit. definitely, recommend it and will keep on buying.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Malassi

customer_reviews.title: fit too small
customer_reviews.text: ive ordered 2 other Van Heusen Shirts that fit fine but this one came very small. Im thinking 2 sizes small.
customer_reviews.author: Samsayscheese

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Certainly, a $100 shirt may look and/or even feel better. However, this shirt exceeded my expectations. The fit was perfect for me, the shirt appears to be durable (holding up to regular washings) and I get quite a few compliments on the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Aggressive Owl

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is the only positive thing I can state in which regards this dress shirt. The color is not what I expected (a bit different from the one displayed in the picture above) and it doesn't fit quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt.
customer_reviews.text: According to my expectations, and Its fabric is fabulous. I would like to recommend to all my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Coeel

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This shirt makes me look good. I like the fabric of this, soft but a bit rough.The sleeves aren't too long or too short on my arms and not too tight. Overall, i like this shirt an d I bought it in other colors too.
customer_reviews.author: William	Huffman

customer_reviews.title: wrinkle free
customer_reviews.text: Great wrinkle free dress shirt, its perfect for guys who are always on the run especially with the kind of work that I do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: formal dress shirt
customer_reviews.text: It fits well and its so formal that its perfect for going to the office
customer_reviews.author: Charles Witt

customer_reviews.title: dress shirt
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice, dress shirt it doesn't easily get all worn out and disoriented when worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Van Heusen Men's Dress Shirt Fitted Poplin Solid
product_meta.description: Long sleeve fitted wrinkle free solid
feature_bullets: Wrinkle Free: Developed for less wrinkles and easy care
Fitted Fit: Roomier through the shoulders, chest and arms, with a tapered waist
Point Collar: Classic collar thought to lengthen the face & allows for tie knot variety; can be worn with or without neckwear
Adjustable Cuff: Two button positions allow for a more customized, improved fit
Chest Pocket: Classic design holds all your essentials
